reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting the sleeves hit at the elbow, and appreciate its classic style and nice material. The dress is comfortable and flattering, with one customer mentioning it hides wide hips, while another notes it hugs in all the right places. They like its modest size, pockets, and quality construction. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowy and Fun Dress
items.body: Great dress! True to size. I’m 5’8” and 125 pounds and wear a small. Comfortable material with no see through areas. V neck is perfect and not too low, sleeves hit at the elbow with an adorable ruffle. Great skirt movement and the pockets are ideal. A little bit of stretch to the material. Length hits me at the knee which was a great for a nice event. Form fitting waist that looks tailored for such a low price. So comfortable and I did not need to iron it at all straight out of the bag. I love the black skirt with black and white polka dot top. It looks high end and could have been purchased at a nice boutique! Read more
items.author: LBI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and Beautiful Color!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! The fit is flattering without being too tight, and the colors are vibrant and true to the photos. The material feels durable and comfortable it has just the right amount of stretch. I did size up for the breast area. I haven’t washed it yet, but it seems like it’ll hold up well. Plus, it has pockets! Great for church, weddings, or even a nice dinner out. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, comfortable dress!
items.body: Very cute dress! Super comfortable. Fit great and the length was perfect. It has pockets!!! Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for a semi formal occasion
items.body: This pretty and flowy dress is a great choice for any occasion. It fits a big more snug from the top and a bit more loose at the bottom. Read more
items.author: Sandra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress!
items.body: This is a very nice dress for a very reasonable price. It is well made and versatile... you can dress it up or down. I have a pear shape, and it was perfect and flattering on me. I give this dress 5 stars! Read more
items.author: Nunziata

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thick material.
items.body: The material is thick and scratchy. I was disappointed because it fit well, and cute look Read more
items.author: Chance

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Fits well, true to size. Easy to wear Read more
items.author: Audre Sauers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t wait to wear it!
items.body: I tried it on and love the fit. Such a nice style. I washed it and dried it partially on low and then air dried just in case. The fabric is a little unusual. Read more
items.author: Ellen Mitchell

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black+wine, Buffalo Plaid, Navy+striped, 0 Burgundy, Navy Floral, Black Floral, 0 Purple, Royal Blue+black, Pumpkin, Army Green, Purple+black, Black+floral, Pink+black, 0 Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
